bulletPoints: Implemented custom Puppeteer scripts to automate intricate form submissions, slashing submission time by 80% from 4 minutes to just 48 seconds, improving data accuracy by 95%, and accelerating project completion time by 90%

Refined security protocols by modifying the browser's user-agent and fingerprinting data, ensuring a 100% success rate in task automation while upholding professional and ethical standards and driving continual improvements in efficiency

Streamlined the high-volume email data parsing process by developing an automated system with Google APIs and Node.js, shortening data processing time by 50% and diminishing manual data entry tasks by 70%

Engineered a robust cross-platform desktop application using Electron, expanding the user base through broad OS compatibility and incorporating stringent security measures that significantly mitigated potential exploitations by 60%

Initiated 10+ user-facing features in React, utilizing the container pattern and creating reusable components to maintain and standardize the codebase through abstractions and the Flux architecture, achieving maximum efficiency

Integrated WebSocket technology to establish a full-duplex connection, facilitating network traffic by 20% and enabling seamless and real-time updates of contract logs between the test API server and client
